In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Childe" [[Tartaglia]] ({{Hydro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

In this event wish, the 4-star characters "Thorny Benevolence" [[Rosaria]] ({{Cryo}}), "Shining Idol" [[Barbara]] ({{Hydro}}), and "Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" [[Fischl]] ({{Electro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!

After this wish event ends, the 4-star character "Thorny Benevolence" [[Rosaria]] ({{Cryo}}) will be added to the Standard Wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]" in [[Version 1.5]].

Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
